title: Earth Catastrophes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/3/19
itunes:title: Earth Catastrophes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/3/19
description:
George Noory and scientific reporter Ben Davidson explore his research on Earth catastrophes, and how there has been a coverup of an upcoming solar event that could liquefy the planet's mantle and kill most life on Earth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
